scripts.build:all: lerna exec -- npx parcel build index.js
scripts.test: echo running all tests is not supported, maybe run: "yarn test:lint"
scripts.push: echo push is not yet supported
scripts.push:version: git add . && git commit -am 'version update' && git push
scripts.clean:all: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist node_modules yarn.lock .parcel-cache yarn-error.log
